column3: His brows went up in surprise.

column1: 父亲说我可以上大学，因此我认为我要准备入学考试。
column2: fùqīn shuō wǒ kěyǐ shàng dàxué yīncǐ wǒ rènwéi wǒ yào zhǔnbèi rùxué kǎoshì
column3: Father say I may enter a university, so I think I will prepare for the entrance examination.

column1: 机场附近的战斗持续了一个星期，敌军才被击溃。
column2: jīchǎng fùjìn de zhàndòu chíxù le yī gè xīngqī díjūn cái bèi jīkuì
column3: The fighting around the airport continued for a week before the enemy was defeated.

column1: 她的要求完全合情合理.
column2: tā de yāoqiú wánquán héqínghélǐ
column3: She's perfectly reasonable in her demands.

column1: 他不但不承认，反而支吾其词。
column2: tā bùdàn bù chéngrèn fǎn'ér zhīwúqící
column3: Instead of admit his guilt, he prevaricate.

column1: 蚂蚁的社会结构非常有趣。
column2: mǎyǐ de shèhuì jiégòu fēicháng yǒuqù
column3: The social order of ants is very interesting.

column1: 他们表达了强烈的抗议。
column2: tāmen biǎodá le qiángliè de kàngyì
column3: They expressed a vehement protest.

column1: 他的计划迅速变为现实。
column2: tā de jìhuà xùnsù biànwéi xiànshí
column3: His plans were transformed overnight into reality.

column1: 他猛击对手的身体.
column2: tā měngjī duìshǒu de shēntǐ
column3: He punished his opponent with fierce punches to the body.
